name: Freshwomen Nightmare
description:
Hi, this is Freshwomen Nightmare, a survival horror game inspired by the university of the author. The game is in early development stage, so the first updates are gonna be just the Testing map. I'm currently on computer science degree so I may work on this project only when I have spare time. but you can download the game if you want, to see the progress I've made so far.

**THE BASIC GAMEPLAY IS ALMOST READY,  ONLY A FEW ELEMENTS LIKE AI AND SHOOTING ARE MISSING. WHEN IT'S DONE, I'M GONNA START WORKNING ON THE MAP**

Current Features:

-Basic movement (walk, run, crouch, jump, look);

-Interactable objecs (doors and items in world);

-Note system (read documents around the world);

-Inventory System;

-Health and Damage systems;

-Footsteps sounds in various types of terrain;

-Flashlight;

-Complete moldable UI

Planned Features/ in development:

-Stalker with complete AI;

-Shooting  System;

-Unlockable doors and cases;

-A map recreation of my campus, wich the game are based of;
